text: Læa phwk khea klaw wa cheuxfang tæ meux phwk khea xxk pi cak cea læw klum hnung nı phwk khea kdi wangphæn nı wela klangkhun xun cak sing thi cea klaw læa xallxhˌ ca thrng banthuk sing thi phwk khea wangphæn kan nı wela klangkhun dangnan cng pheikchey tx phwk khea seiy læa cng mxbhmay kæ xallxhˌ theid læa phx pheiyng læw thi xallxhˌ pen phu thi di rab mxbhmay hı khumkhrxng raksʹa
